description: Oral promise in consideration of marriage
facts: Ian orally promised to transfer his beach house to Julia if she agreed to marry him
The beach house is valued at $500,000
asp_facts: contract(c5). subject_matter(c5, property_transfer). parties(c5, ian, julia). consideration_type(c5, marriage). has_writing(c5, no). property_value(c5, 500000). has_consideration(c5, yes).
question: Is this promise enforceable under the Statute of Frauds?
rationale: Promises made in consideration of marriage must be in writing under the Statute of Frauds.
